a flying vehicle with wings and at least one engine
aeroplane.translation[0].note_box[0].ite: You usually say get on an aeroplane
The last two passengers got on the aeroplane
You say get off an aeroplane

The film is set on an aeroplane
that someone is in an aeroplane
